email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
It's Tuesday!
We kicked the week off with a whopping TWO events yesterday, the Docker workshop and the Valentine's Bar Night. Today (Tuesday) we're holding our Internship 101 event, where you can find out about internships at companies that are still hiring from past interns. And on Thursday we're running a Kotlin workshop at 18.30, which follows the lunchtime iPr0gram talk on the same day. Don't miss breakfast on Friday!
Definitely a packed week! Check out below for more details and keep the biscuit suggestions coming!
email.heading: Internship 101
DoCSoc Committee Elections Talk

event.text: Interested in helping to run DoCSoc next year? Come to a short talk to hear about the role of the committee positions you can run for at the upcoming Leadership Elections!

email.heading: JetBrains: Kotlin Hands-On
EF x DoCSoc Breakfast

event.text:
Get your Friday off to a great start with DoCSoc's third regular free breakfast of the year - this time generously sponsored by EF!
Come along to Huxley 217/218 any time between 8:30 and 10:30am and enjoy a great pre-lecture breakfast with other DoCSoc'ers. You can learn more about EF at https://www.joinef.com!

email.heading: Oculus Rift Loan System
email.text:
We've put in place a new loan system that allows you to take out an Oculus Rift for use in your projects.
Fill in the form at https://docsoc.co.uk/oculus to make a booking!
email.sign:
That's all for now!
Until next time,
email.text: This week's biscuit brought to you by: Anonymous. [Submit Biscuit](https://docsoc.co.uk/suggest-biscuit).
